How to enable

```java
// whitelist
-Ddubbo.application.hessian2.whitelist=true
-Ddubbo.application.hessian2.allow="org.apache.dubbo.demo.*"
```

or

```java
// blacklist
-Ddubbo.application.hessian2.whitelist=false
-Ddubbo.application.hessian2.deny="org.malicious.code.*"
```

Now, I doubt the design of the notification retry. In what case does a notification need to be retried, every exception in every step is predictable and they will happen again if they happened for the first time.
Netty may have a conflict. Check it out
please send email to security@dubbo.apache.org to discuss security issues like this.

I think improving the performance by checking `single` `power of two` is a good shot.

But:
1. It does not need to be so complex, for example, no need to implement it as SPI
2. please provide the performance statistics.

I solve this problem by customizing org.apache.dubbo.rpc.cluster.interceptor.ClusterInterceptorï¼ŒEvery time  set up static tag by `interceptor.before`


e.g:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55343460/86337724-127b5900-bc84-11ea-8c1e-eb20df7ae92e.png)
